mapper.select: select blog.id , blog.title , blog.content , blog.created_time , blog.user_id , user.name , user.password , user.email from blog left join user on blog.user_id = user.id where blog.id = #{id}

select blog.id, blog.title, blog.content, blog.created_time, blog.user_id , user.name, user.email , user.password, comment.content as comment_content, comment.id as comment_id, comment.created_time as comment_created_time, comment.blog_id as comment_blog_id, comment.user_id as comment_user_id from (blog join user on blog.user_id = user.id) join comment on comment.blog_id = blog.id where blog.id = #{id}
